issue.title: [CF 903] Activation border when spell not active?
issue.body:
Hello,

I play a hunter and would like for my serpent sting TMW icon to have Blizzard's activation border around it when it's NOT active on my current hostile target. I can get it to where it will do what I want it only after the debuff falls off. I want it to where when I even look at a new target, the icon will glow. Sorry if this is a simple fix, but I've been trying just about everything! Thanks in advace!

Screenshot included.


> Posted by CurseForge user mdbryner | Imported from CurseForge issue #903 | Raw

If that is a Buff/Debuff icon, then add a Stop Animations animation to the icon's On Start event and add an Activation Border event to the icon's On Finish event.

No response after two weeks. Closing ticket.
